title: Lunch break w/ Baz!
body: As always standard rules apply! This one is pretty special though, cause I can now reveal that I'm one of the product managers on the newly announced Wild Rift, the League MOBA experience coming to console and mobile :3. Feel free to ask questions about it, but keep in mind there are a lot of details wont be able to answer (apologies in advanced). Lets do this, readyyyy break!
